title: Ian Wilson (phonetician)
text: Ian Wilson is a professor at the University of Aizu in Aizuwakamatsu city, Fukushima prefecture , Japan . His field of research is phonetics , especially articulatory phonetics . He is one of the first teacher/researchers to use ultrasound in a large-scale ESL classroom as a method of providing direct visual biofeedback to pronunciation learners on the movements of the tongue during speech.
